Detailed Description

Knowledge manages the linguistic information for Chinese morphological analysis.

Knowledge manages the linguistic information for Chinese morphological analysis.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum cma::Knowledge::EncodeType

Encode type of characters.

Enumerator:
ENCODE_TYPE_GB2312  GB 2312 character type.
ENCODE_TYPE_BIG5  Big 5 character type.
ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8  UTF8 character type.
ENCODE_TYPE_NUM  the count of character types

virtual int cma::Knowledge::loadStopWordDict ( const char *  fileName  )  [pure virtual]

Load the stop-word dictionary file, which is in text format. The words in this file are ignored in the morphological analysis result.

Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success

void cma::Knowledge::setEncodeType ( EncodeType  type  )
